sites.name: linkedin
sites.note: LinkedIn’s Terms of Service explicitly forbids scraping or using automated agents without express written permission. Use official APIs or licensed partners instead.

alternatives.comment: If you need job data, request access through LinkedIn's API or use official data partners. Public scraping (including /jobs/search) is prohibited.

prohibitedActivities: Using bots or scrapers to extract job or profile data without permission
Bulk downloading or indexing of listings or user profiles
Using data for machine learning / AI model training without explicit license
